update.description:
Refactor the `_github_setup` to only create the github local checkout and use a new `_github_get_formula_hash` to keep the previous behaviour working.

I changed the `homebrew_bottle_pullrequest` script to iterate over the json files and call the commit on each one. PACKAGE_ALIAS and VERSION have been overwritten by the json variables.
update.title: Brew: support for multiple json files in PR updater

pull_request.title: Brew: support for multiple json files in PR updater

content.raw:
The next upload succeeded:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/repository_uploader_ng/2907

thanks!

and I've merged that sdformat3 / gazebo6 pull request

there is one more set of bottles to be built: sdformat / gazebo5. should I build those now so we can test against this branch, or should that wait until you've made the next pull request?
